de.ryanthara.ja.rycon

Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ryanthara.ja.rycon.Main
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MainApplication

    public abstract class Main
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class for holding values, constants and objects for the complete RyCON application.

    This class was implemented after version 1 of RyCON to get easier access to different things. The main idea to do this comes from JOSM.

    Since:
    2
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    sebastian

      • RyCON_GRID_HEIGHT

        private static final int RyCON_GRID_HEIGHT
        The height of a grid cell. Window size and others are calculated from these values. RyCON grid uses a golden rectangle cut with an aspect ratio of 1.618:1
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • RyCON_GRID_WIDTH

        private static final int RyCON_GRID_WIDTH
        The width of a grid cell. Window size and others are calculated from these values. RyCON grid uses golden rectangle cut with an aspect ratio of 1.618:1
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
